TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewDeletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发单击控件中的删除按钮时的事件或调用方法，但之后控件删除项。The control raises the event when a Delete button in the control is clicked or the method is called, but after the control deletes the item. (删除按钮是一个按钮的`CommandName`属性设置为"删除"。)这使你能够在每当发生此事件，例如检查删除操作的结果时执行自定义的例程的事件处理方法。(A Delete button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of a delete operation. 一个对象传递给事件处理方法。A object is passed to the event-handling method. 此对象可以确定受影响的项目和可能发生的任何异常的数量。This object enables you to determine the number of items affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受影响的删除操作的项的数目，请使用属性。To determine the number of items that were affected by the delete operation, use the property. 若要确定是否发生了任何异常，请使用属性。To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the property. 您可以指示是否处理了事件处理方法中的异常通过设置属性。You can indicate whether you have handled the exception in the event-handling method by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果删除操作过程中发生异常，属性设置为`false`，则控件重新引发的异常。If an exception occurs during the delete operation and the property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要访问的已删除项的键字段，请使用属性。To access the key fields of the deleted item, use the property. 若要访问已删除的项的非键字段，请使用属性。To access non-key fields of the deleted item, use the property. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象，以确定是否在删除操作期间发生了异常。The following example shows how to use the object to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. 对象传递给事件处理方法事件。The object is passed to the event-handling method for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

param.span: 执行删除操作时引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: The exception that was raised when the delete operation was performed, if any.

param.span: 如果未引发任何异常，则使用 。

span.span: If no exception was raised, use .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。You can use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events. 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||`e` 参数的值。The value of the `e` parameter.| ||`false`。`false`.|

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取受删除操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.

value.span: 受删除操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定受影响的删除操作的项的数目，报告的数据源控件。Use the property to determine the number of items that were affected by the delete operation, as reported by the data source control. 此属性通常用于确定正确的项目数已删除以下方面：This property is typically used to determine whether the correct number of items were deleted in the following ways: - 若要确认已删除单个项。To verify that only a single item was deleted. 有时编写不正确的 delete 语句可以删除多个项。Sometimes an incorrectly written delete statement can delete multiple items. - 若要验证删除项，是否删除操作过程中发生错误，但未引发任何异常。To verify that an item was deleted if an error occurs during the delete operation but no exception was raised. - 若要验证支持开放式并发的数据源控件时，已删除项 (如并控件) 具有其属性设置为`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`枚举值。To verify that an item was deleted when a data source control that supports optimistic concurrency (such as the and controls) has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 在此设置，可能不会删除已由另一个用户修改的项。Under this setting, an item that has been modified by another user might not be deleted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以验证在删除操作期间已删除项。The following example shows how to use the property to verify that an item was deleted during the delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取在删除操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: Gets the exception, if any, that was raised during the delete operation.

value.span: 删除操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）；否则为 。

span.span: The exception that was raised during the delete operation, if any; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要获取删除操作过程中引发的异常，如果任何属性。Use the property to get the exception that was raised during the delete operation, if any. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了一个异常和事件处理程序中，设置中处理异常属性设置为`true`。If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 否则为控件重新引发的异常。Otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定在删除操作期间是否发生了异常。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExceptionHandled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在事件处理程序中处理了删除操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当删除操作过程中引发异常时，使用属性以指示是否处理异常的事件执行过程。When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the property to indicate whether you handled the exception during the event. 如果此属性设置为`true`，异常将被视为处理且不会重新引发。If this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果此属性设置为`false`，则控件重新引发的异常。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以指示是否已在事件处理程序处理异常。The following example shows how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

span.span: Gets the key or keys for the deleted item.
The key or keys for the deleted item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性访问的键字段的值 (由指定属性) 的已删除的项。Use the property to access the values of the key fields (as specified by the property) for a deleted item. 例如，可以使用这些值以保留已删除项目的日志。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted items. > [!NOTE] > 此属性只包含键字段。This property contains only the key fields. 若要访问非键字段，请使用属性。To access the non-key fields, use the property. 属性返回一个对象，实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 此对象包含表示已删除的项的键字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the key fields of the deleted item. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来访问已删除的项的键字段的值。The following example shows how to use the property to access the values of the key fields for a deleted item. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取已删除项的非键字段值。

span.span: Gets the non-key field values for the deleted item.

value.span: 已删除项的非键字段值。

span.span: The non-key field values for the deleted item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问已删除的项的非键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted item. 例如，可以使用这些值以保留已删除项目的日志。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted items. > [!NOTE] > 仅在使用双向绑定表达式时，填充属性模板，如模板。The property is populated only when two-way binding expressions are used in the templates, such as the template. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 属性返回一个对象，实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 此对象包含表示已删除的项的非键字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the non-key fields of the deleted item. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不包含键字段 (如指定的那样属性) 已删除项。This property does not contain the key fields (as specified by the property) for the deleted item. 若要访问的键字段，请使用属性。To access the key fields, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来访问已删除的项的非键字段的值。The following example shows how to use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted item. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysVB.aspx#2)]
